creator: joeo@enigmastation.com
text:
When I am using RequestDispatcher from a taglib, the request is relative not to
the current resource's directory, but to the actual RESOURCE. This means if my
tag is called from "/index.jsp", attempting to find "test.xml" as an included
resource, it tries to find "/index.jsptest.xml". As I read the spec (section 8.1
and thereabouts) this is not expected behavior.

This works for me with the latest (from CVS) versions of TC4 and TC5. The most 
likely explanation is that the root cause of this issue was fixed in response 
to another bug.

If you still experience this bug with the latest TC4/TC5 please feel free to 
re-open this bug report. As this works for me, if you do re-open this bug 
report please include the steps necessary to reproduce the bug or better yet a 
simple web app that demonstrates it.
